alert.note: Alert for Campbell; Corson; Dewey; Walworth (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued November 09 at 9:40AM MST until November 10 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Blizzard Warning, blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 10 inches and ice accumulations of up to two tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle accumulations of a glaze. * WHERE...Corson, Campbell, Walworth and Dewey Counties. * WHEN...For the Blizzard Warning, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Thursday night. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
